Package net.ggtools.grand.tasks

Interface Summary
GraphFilterType Interface implemented by actual GraphFilterType.
 

Class Summary
ConnectedFilterType  
FilterType A meta class for graph filters.
FromNodeFilterType Ant's front end for the FromFilter.
GrandTask A task to create graphs.
GraphFilterFactory A class to instanciante the right filter type classes based on the name parameter.
IsolatedNodeFilterType Ant frontend to IsolatedNodeFilter.
MissingNodeFilterType Ant frontend to MissingNodeFilter.
NodeRemoverFilterType Front end to the NodeRemoverFilter class for filtering from the grand ant task.
ToNodeFilterType
